publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden.
S1M-389 Water and Sewarage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Richard Lochhead*

S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden.
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Shona Robison*

S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Shona Robison
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Robin Harper*
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Shona Robison, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Cathy Jamieson
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Brian Adam*
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Alex Neil*
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Shona Robison, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Cathy Jamieson, Brian Adam, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Christine Grahame*

S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Shona Robison, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Cathy Jamieson, Brian Adam, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Christine Grahame
S1M-389 Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households (lodged on 15 December 1999) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-389 Tommy Sheridan: Water and Sewerage Charges and Low Income Households—That the Parliament agrees with the Scottish Local Government Forum Against Poverty that the issue of affordability of water and sewerage charges is a serious issue for low income households and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward plans to alleviate this burden. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Shona Robison, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Cathy Jamieson, Brian Adam, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White
